tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_contracts_parameters (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(100),
    creator_address VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date DATE,
    parameters JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_id UUID,
  event_type VARCHAR(100),
  event_data JSON,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY, contract_name VARCHAR(255), contract_address VARCHAR(255), creation_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    version INT,
    creator VARCHAR(255),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contract_parameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    param_name VARCHAR(255),
    param_value VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE parameter_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter_id INT,
    old_value VARCHAR(255),
    new_value VARCHAR(255),
    change_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (parameter_id) REFERENCES contract_parameters(parameter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_address VARCHAR(255),
    contract_owner VARCHAR(255),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contract_parameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    parameter_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_data JSON,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_functions (
    function_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    function_name VARCHAR(255),
    function_params JSON,
    function_output JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_versions (
    version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    version_number VARCHAR(50),
    release_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);
